name: Fireworks Show
richDescription: A show of fireworks in the sky
description: A spectacular fireworks show that will light up the night sky with a dazzling array of colors and patterns. Join us for an unforgettable evening of entertainment, music, and celebration as we commemorate this special occasion with a breathtaking display of pyrotechnics.

name: Basketball Tournament
description: Join us for an exciting basketball tournament where teams will compete for the championship. Enjoy a day of thrilling matches, teamwork, and sportsmanship. Don't miss the action and cheer for your favorite team in this competitive event.
